entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Friday 14 April 2023
